mapper.select:
SELECT p.PAYMENT_ID AS "paymentId", o.ORDER_ID AS "orderId", TO_CHAR(p.PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "paymentDate", u.UNAME AS "uname", cc.TYPE AS "type", oh.PRICE AS "price", oh.PRICE - (oh.PRICE * 0.10) AS "netProfit" FROM payment p JOIN orders o ON p.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID JOIN users u ON o.USER_ID = u.USER_ID JOIN order_history oh ON o.ORDER_ID = oh.ORDER_ID JOIN common_code cc ON p.PAYMENT_TYPE_CODE = cc.CODE WHERE 1=1
AND p.PAYMENT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND p.PAYMENT_ID = #{paymentId}
AND o.ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
AND u.UNAME LIKE '%' || #{unme} || '%'
AND cc.CODE = 'PT001'
AND cc.CODE = 'PT002'
AND cc.CODE = 'PT003'
AND cc.CODE = 'PT004'
ORDER BY p.PAYMENT_DATE DESC, p.PAYMENT_ID DESC
